title: Add Dummy Documentation
description:
## Scope
Add documentation for the dummy module created in previous stories.

## Technical Details
- Create a `dummy/README.md` documenting the `greet` and `calculate` functions
- Include usage examples and API reference
- Add inline JSDoc comments to the exported functions

## Acceptance Criteria
- `dummy/README.md` exists with function documentation
- Both `greet` and `calculate` are documented with examples
- JSDoc comments are added to exported functions in `dummy/index.js`
guidance: This is a dummy story for testing. Keep documentation minimal but complete.
doneWhen: README and JSDoc comments exist for all exported functions.
avoid: Do not generate auto-documentation or add documentation tooling.
